1.0.name: wordpress/wp-e-commerce-bulk-category-pricing
1.0.description: This plugin allows WP E-Commerce store admins to select certain categories as 'bulk pricing' categories, add a product threshold and discount to that category. On the front-end, when any combination of products from one of these categories is in the shopping cart, and has met or exceeded the specified threshold, the specified discount is applied to each product.
